#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
long long nums[]={0, 9, 189, 2889, 38889, 488889, 5888889, 68888889, 788888889, 8888888889, 
					98888888889, 1088888888889, 11888888888889, 128888888888889, 1388888888888889, 
					14888888888888889};
main(){
	int t;
	long long n,k;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t>0){
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
		int i=0,digit=0;
		while(k>nums[i])
			i++;
		k=k-nums[i-1];
		if(k%i==0)
			digit=i;
		else
			digit=k%i;
		k=ceil(k/(i+0.0));
		long long s=pow(10,i-1)-1+k;
		char str[25];
		sprintf(str,"%lld",s);
		printf("%c\n",str[digit-1]);
		t--;
	}
}
